comments.body: This is stupid but we can kill it tomorrow and given that everyone is blocked on this, I donâ€™t want to spend the time to figure out a nicer solution.

diffHunk:

     }
 
     da_enable_scoop
-    $isScoopEnabled = da_is_scoop_installed
+    # $isScoopEnabled = da_is_scoop_installed

+    $isScoopEnabled = $false
